title: October 24th, 2017
text: Seems like we worked most of the details out. We still need to figure put how to load in custom templates, though. For subpages that contain more than text.

title: October 23rd, 2017
text: The website is up, but it still has some problems. Some big problems.

title: October 20th, 2017
text: Back at it. Looks like we figured out routing to a degree.

title: October 19th, 2017
text: How about placing each subpage into its own template? That would allow us more freedom of design.

title: October 18th, 2017
text: Seems like nesting components are the future. How deep can we go?

title: October 17th, 2017
text: Hmm, seems like we can either run code in the (click) function or do custom routing, but not both.
